long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickBlock is a lightweight and free Chrome extension designed to help users escape distractions and maintain focus on important tasks. With QuickBlock, users can easily block a set of distracting websites to create a distraction-free work environment. Unlike other productivity tools, FocusBlock doesn't require any login or account creation â€“ users can simply add the extension to their Chrome browser and start using it right away.
